name: Metal Sonic Hyperdrive
storyline:
After yet, another defeat by the hands of Sonic, Dr. Robotnik decided to rebuild Eggrobo and send him out to search for the Chaos Emeralds, as Eggrobo was searching he found and kidnapped Tails hoping to lure the blue blur out.

Tails had other plans, and proceeded to escape to Robotnik's Base without being noticed Tails managed to steal spare robot parts Robotnik had and quickly left, with Sonic nowhere to be found Tails built his own take on Metal Sonic's classic model Codenamed: METAL.

This version of Metal Sonic had the Ability to think and feel similarly to Sonic, after completing the project Tails tracked Eggrobo's last location to Robotic Isle, he then sends Metal Sonic out to put a stop to Eggrobo and Eggman's Plans.
summary:
Metal Sonic Hyperdrive is a modification of Sonic the Hedgehog that stars Metal Sonic as the main character role - more specifically a reprogrammed Metal Sonic.

The hack also features other characters besides Metal such as: Sonic,Lone Devil (KAZ),Kirby, and even Somari!

Each coming with their own unique abilities:

Metal can use the Super Peel-Out, and Maximum Hyperdrive Attacks, Sonic can Spindash in traditional fashion.

Somari can spindash, but in a less traditional fasion, Lone Devil can use his Sythe to attack and freefall, and Kirby can inhale enemies, no copy abilities.
